attributes.action: Prevent the holding of a second EU Referendum unless new facts become available.
attributes.additional_details: Prevent the holding of a second EU Referendum unless significant facts become available that were not available to the voting public at the time of the original EU Referendum on 23rd June 2016.
attributes.background: The Remain supporters have raised a petition to hold a second EU Referendum. This is not democratic, it will waste taxpayers money and it will prolong the period of uncertainty and the nation will remain divided. We should embrace the result of the democratic vote and start working together.
